sentences.en: Early birds can get the best bargains in the January sales.
sentences.cn: 动作快的人能够在1月份的打折中淘到最便宜的东西。

sentences.en: He arrived on January 9, disheveled and much the worse for wear.
sentences.cn: 他是1月9号到的，蓬头垢面，疲惫不堪。

sentences.en: I was in St. Lucia back in January of this year.
sentences.cn: 今年1月份我在圣卢西亚。

sentences.en: I will go to Shanghai in the coming January.
sentences.cn: 在即将到来的一月份，我将去上海。

sentences.en: Shopping in the January sales can be maddening.
sentences.cn: 在元月促销期间购物可能会让人大为恼火。

sentences.en: The club has moved its meeting to Saturday, January 22nd.
sentences.cn: 俱乐部已经把会议日期改到1月22号，星期六。

sentences.en: The company closed down operations and began liquidating its assets in January.
sentences.cn: 公司停止了各项业务，于1月份开始变卖资产。

sentences.en: The couple celebrated their golden wedding in January.
sentences.cn: 这对夫妇一月份举行了他们的金婚大庆。

sentences.en: The General had promised to cede power by January.
sentences.cn: 将军允诺于一月份之前交出兵权。

sentences.en: The lake usually freezes over by mid January.
sentences.cn: 这条湖通常在一月中旬冰封。

sentences.en: The meeting on 31 October is rearranged for 30 January.
sentences.cn: 10月31日的会议重新安排到了1月30日。

sentences.en: The number of passengers by this line fell off slightly in January.
sentences.cn: 一月份这条航线的乘客数量略有减少.

sentences.en: The weather, even for January, was exceptionally cold.
sentences.cn: 这种天气即使在一月份也算得上非常寒冷。

sentences.en: The year began auspiciously with good trade figures for January.
sentences.cn: 一月份贸易额可观,今年一开头就前景光明.

sentences.en: Their first child was conceived in January and born in October.
sentences.cn: 他们的第一个孩子是在一月怀上、十月出生的。

sentences.en: They will have to pay much more when rents treble in January.
sentences.cn: 一月份房租增加两倍时，他们将被迫多付不少钱。

sentences.en: We always have snow in January.
sentences.cn: 我们这里1月份总会下雪。

trans.tran_en: the first month of the year, between December and February
the first month of the year, between December and February
